news_header: The trade agreement between India and the United States is nearing finalization, with President Trump and Prime Minister Modi discussing increased arms trade and the sale of F-35 fighters.
news_original_title: Trump ja Modi keskustelivat kauppasuhteista Washingtonissa – Yhdysvallat aikoo myydä hävittäjiä Intiaan
news_text: The goal is to double trade within five years, with India agreeing to import more US oil and gas. Trump indicated that the US will impose reciprocal tariffs on India, and Modi invited Trump to visit India later this year.
